title: Call Me Princess
description: Homicide detective Louise Rick chases a disturbing serial rapist in this fast-paced thriller in Sara Blaedels breakout series, perfect for readers of Lisa Gardner, Tami Hoag, Tess Gerritsen, or Jo Nesb.An online flirtation can have horrific consequences, as Detective Louise Rick discovers when she is called to an idyllic Copenhagen neighborhood where a young woman has been left bound and gagged after a profoundly brutal rape attack. Susanne Hansson met her rapist on a popular dating website. But the man is hiding behind a labyrinth of false pseudonyms, and neither Susannenor the policehave been able to trace his true identity. With the internet as his playground, the rapist will almost certainly strike again if Louise cant unmask him before its too late.Incredible suspense and a diabolical series of twists take Sara Blaedels wildly popular series to new heights.
author: Sara Blaedel
